definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]

sentences.english: Visit Big Wild Goose Pagoda and Shaanxi History Museum in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 早上参观大雁塔和陕西历史博物馆。

sentences.english: Allan holds an office in the American biggest weapon manufacture company Christian era company.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦在美国最大的武器制造公司西历公司任职。

sentences.english: Do I go by the lunar calendar or the Western calendar in China?
sentences.chinese: 那么，我在中国是用农历呢还是西历？

sentences.chinese: 早上，参观大雁塔和陕西历史博物馆。

definition: old calendar/the Chinese lunar calendar/same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]
the traditional Chinese calendar/the lunar calendar
old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
variant of 曆法|历法 calendar
first month of the lunar year
first month (of either lunar or Western calendars)
1-3 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
